about_the_game:
If you like my free painting simulator, V-Art, you can support me by purchasing this DLC.
It's like a tip, but you get some spicy content for it.


Features:
-Adorable character lovingly sculpted by my friend Richard before this project was essentially abandoned. She does not have a name, perhaps the community could decide.
-Brushes/Sprays/Goo's work as expected
-Fully and manually poseable
-Lifeless/No Soul so you don't have to feel bad contorting her into strange positions and making her pose for long periods of artistic creation
-Saving/Autosave work even on flesh!

Limitations:
-I wasn't able to fix the seams that appear at UV joins
-Painting may be laggier than on normal canvas as a performance consideration
-Paint doesn't drip, no drip, + L


P.S. Richard would like you to know he apologizes for the terrible hand/feet anatomy.
In fairness, the character model is unfinished.

content_descriptors.notes: While not explicit, this DLC does feature a fully modeled nude character to paint. Artist's discretion advised.
